title.rendered: Can The IRS Really Take Everything I Own?

content.rendered:
The IRS can seize your assets if you owe back taxes and fail to resolve your tax debt. This includes bank accounts, wages, and even physical property like cars or homes. affordable Tax Relief CEO, David King, and Lead Tax Attorney, Philip Hwang, provide helpful insight on how you can resolve your tax burden and get back on track with the IRS. 


If You Need Tax Help, Contact Us Today for a Free Consultation
